      Parameters:
      model - the all data of the API

  • Method Details

    • registerOrEnter

      public long registerOrEnter()
      Checking API Access: If the user exists, its existence is only verified. If the user does not exist, a new registration is made.
      Returns:
      id, by setRegister method, the new customer ID or idEnter, by getRegister method, the existent customer ID

    • buyTicket

      public void buyTicket(long id)
      Buy a ticket
      Parameters:
      id - the ticket purchaser customer ID

    • cancelTicket

      public void cancelTicket(LocalDateTime today, long id, int jk)
      Cancel an effective ticket or cancel a booking ticket
      Parameters:
      id - the customr ID
      jk - the jockey that sets the intended ticket state - effective or booking

    • showCustomersOneFlight

      public void showCustomersOneFlight(int effectiveOrBooking)
      Show all customers that have effective ticket of a flight or show all customers that have booking ticket of a flight
      Parameters:
      effectiveOrBooking - the status of the ticket (Effective ticket - 1 | Booking ticket - 2)

    • showTripsOneCustomer

      public void showTripsOneCustomer(LocalDateTime today, int pastEffectiveBooking, long idCustomer)
      Show trips of one customer
      Parameters:
      today - the day considered as the day today
      pastEffectiveBooking - the status ticket (Past - -1 | Effestive - 1 | Booking - 2)
      idCustomer - the status customer: idCustomer - 0, the method showTripsOneCustomer() run in mode flight attendant (the order comes from an administrator) idCustomer - real ID, the method showTripsOneCustomer() run in mode customer (the order comes from a customer)
